title: Stage Lv10-S21
description: Level 10 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: Wow, this is way better than I expected!
Hmm, it's a bit different from what I expected.
learning_points: Level 10 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: Wow, this is way better than I expected!
Hmm, it's a bit different from what I expected.
Oh, this is pretty good! I like it.
Huh? That's weird. Something feels awkward.
Wow, this is absolutely amazing! So impressive.

sentences.kr: 에이, 실망이야. 이 정도밖에 안 돼?
sentences.en: Aw, I'm disappointed. Is this all there is?

sentences.kr: 헉, 이런 걸 기대했던 건 아니었는데.
sentences.en: Whoa, this isn't what I was expecting at all.
Oh ho, interesting. I need to look at this more.
